name: Tiny Quest: Desert
description:
After losing all his research buddies on a science expedition, one of your distant relatives for some reason suddenly puts the fates of his lost team members in your hands. It is now your job to follow the tracks of the expedition, solve puzzles, find clues and rescue all the out-to-lunch members of the misguided expedition.

Can you navigate the desert well enough and solve the puzzles necessary to rescue research buddy #2? Will there be any adversaries along the way—other than a few mysterious puzzles?

Tiny Quest: Desert is the second in a series of similar tiny puzzle–adventures. The first one, Tiny Quest Jungle, is available for free in your app store. Visit tinysprout.com and follow us on Twitter at @tinysproutgames to stay up to date with future releases.

Stay adventurous and remember to use your brain!
